snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing: Puyo Puyo Puzzle Pop! 🎉
 
🔵 Puyo Puyo gameplay in your pocket!
🟣 24 Playable Characters via unlocks and post-launch DLC!
🔴 All-new Voice casted Story!
🟢 Single-player & Multiplayer modes!
 
Arriving April 4th exclusively on Apple Arcade!
🔗: https://apple.co/puyopuyo-us
